subject: Soccer
Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
Demonstrations, Protests, and Riots
lead_paragraph: Al Ahly of Cairo has proved resilient — even winning a major tournament — after a bloody brawl between rival groups of Egyptian soccer fans in February left over 70 of its fans dead.
snippet: Al Ahly of Cairo has proved resilient — even winning a major tournament — after a bloody brawl between rival groups of Egyptian soccer fans in February left over 70 of its fans dead.
